00026 QMPair::~QMPair() {
00027     if (_ghost != NULL) {
00028         delete _ghost; _ghost = NULL;
00029     }
00030 }
00031 
00032 
00033 QMPair::QMPair(int id, Segment *seg1, Segment *seg2)
00034         : _id(id), std::pair<Segment*, Segment*>(seg1, seg2),
00035           _hasGhost(0),
00036           _rate12_e(0), _rate21_e(0),
00037           _rate12_h(0), _rate21_h(0),
00038           _has_e(false), _has_h(false),
00039           _lambdaO_e(0), _lambdaO_h(0),
00040           _Jeff2_e(0),   _Jeff2_h(0) {
00041 
00042     _top = seg1->getTopology();
00043 
00044     vec r1 = seg1->getPos();
00045     vec r2 = seg2->getPos();
00046 
00047     _R = _top->PbShortestConnect(r1, r2); // => _R points from 1 to 2
00048 
00049     // Check whether pair formed across periodic boundary
00050     if ( abs(r2 - r1 - _R) > 1e-8 ) {
00051 
00052         _ghost = new Segment(seg2);
00053         _ghost->TranslateBy(r1 - r2 + _R);
00054         _hasGhost = true;
00055 
00056     }
00057     else {
00058         _ghost = NULL;
00059     }
00060 }
00061 
00062 
00063 double QMPair::getLambdaO(int state) {
00064 
00065     return (state == -1) ? _lambdaO_e : _lambdaO_h;
00066 }
00067 
00068 double QMPair::getRate12(int carrier) {
00069 
00070     return (carrier == -1) ? _rate12_e : _rate12_h;
00071 
00072 }
00073 
00074 double QMPair::getRate21(int carrier) {
00075 
00076     return (carrier == -1) ? _rate21_e : _rate21_h;
00077 
00078 }
00079 
00080 void QMPair::setLambdaO(double lO, int state) {
00081 
00082     if (state == -1) {
00083         _lambdaO_e = lO;
00084     }
00085     else if (state == +1) {
00086         _lambdaO_h = lO;
00087     }
00088     else {
00089         throw std::runtime_error(" ERROR CODE whx__01l1o__");
00090     }
00091     
00092 
00093 }

00121 void QMPair::setIsPathCarrier(bool yesno, int carrier) {
00122 
00123     if (carrier == -1) {
00124         _has_e = yesno;
00125     }
00126     else if (carrier == +1) {
00127         _has_h = yesno;
00128     }
00129     else {
00130         throw std::runtime_error(" ERROR CODE whx__01p1r__");
00131     }
00132 }
00133 
00134 bool QMPair::isPathCarrier(int carrier) {
00135 
00136     return (carrier == -1) ? _has_e : _has_h;
00137 }

00139 
00140 void QMPair::setJs(const vector<double> Js, int state) {
00141 
00142     if (state == -1) {
00143         this->_Js_e = Js;
00144         double Jeff2 = this->calcJeff2(state);
00145     }
00146     else if (state == +1) {
00147         this->_Js_h = Js;
00148         double Jeff2 = this->calcJeff2(state);
00149     }
00150     else {
00151         throw std::runtime_error(" ERROR CODE whx__01x1u__");
00152     }
00153 }
00154 
00155 
00156 double QMPair::calcJeff2(int state) {
00157 
00158     vector <double> ::iterator it;
00159     double Jeff2 = 0.0;
00160 
00161     if (state == -1) {
00162         for (it = _Js_e.begin(); it < _Js_e.end(); it++) {
00163             Jeff2 += (*it)*(*it);
00164         }
00165         Jeff2 /= double(_Js_e.size());
00166         _Jeff2_e = Jeff2;
00167     }
00168 
00169     else if (state == +1) {
00170         for (it = _Js_h.begin(); it < _Js_h.end(); it++) {
00171             Jeff2 += (*it)*(*it);
00172         }
00173         Jeff2 /= double(_Js_h.size());
00174         _Jeff2_h = Jeff2;
00175     }
00176 
00177     else {
00178         throw std::runtime_error(" ERROR CODE whx__01y1v__");
00179     }
00180     
00181     return Jeff2;
00182 }
00183 
00184 void QMPair::setJeff2(double Jeff2, int state) {
00185 
00186     if (state == -1) {
00187         _Jeff2_e = Jeff2;
00188     }
00189     else if (state == +1) {
00190         _Jeff2_h = Jeff2;
00191     }
00192     else {
00193         throw std::runtime_error(" ERROR CODE whx__01s1j__");
00194     }
00195 }
00196 
00197 Segment *QMPair::Seg2PbCopy() {
00198     if (_hasGhost) {
00199         return _ghost;
00200     }
00201     else {
00202         return second;
00203     }
00204 }
00205 
00206 void QMPair::WritePDB(string fileName) {
00207 
00208     FILE *pdb = NULL;
00209     pdb = fopen(fileName.c_str(), "w");
00210 
00211     this->first->WritePDB(pdb, "Atoms", "MD");
00212     this->second->WritePDB(pdb, "Atoms", "MD");
00213     if (this->HasGhost()) { this->_ghost->WritePDB(pdb, "Atoms", "MD"); }
00214 
00215     fclose(pdb);
00216 }
00217 
00218 void QMPair::WriteXYZ(FILE *out) {
00219 
00220     int qmatoms = 0;
00221 
00222     vector< Atom* > ::iterator ait;
00223 
00224     for (ait = Seg1PbCopy()->Atoms().begin();
00225          ait < Seg1PbCopy()->Atoms().end();
00226          ++ait) {
00227 
00228         if ((*ait)->HasQMPart()) {
00229             ++qmatoms;
00230         }
00231     }
00232 
00233     for (ait = Seg2PbCopy()->Atoms().begin();
00234          ait < Seg2PbCopy()->Atoms().end();
00235          ++ait) {
00236 
00237         if ((*ait)->HasQMPart()) {
00238             ++qmatoms;
00239         }
00240     }
00241 
00242     fprintf(out, "%6d \n", qmatoms);
00243     fprintf(out, "\n");
00244 
00245     for (ait = Seg1PbCopy()->Atoms().begin();
00246          ait < Seg1PbCopy()->Atoms().end();
00247          ++ait) {
00248 
00249         if (!(*ait)->HasQMPart()) {
00250             continue;
00251         }
00252 
00253         vec     pos = (*ait)->getQMPos();
00254         string  name = (*ait)->getElement();
00255 
00256         fprintf(out, "%2s %4.7f %4.7f %4.7f \n",
00257                         name.c_str(),
00258                         pos.getX()*10,
00259                         pos.getY()*10,
00260                         pos.getZ()*10);
00261     }
00262 
00263     for (ait = Seg2PbCopy()->Atoms().begin();
00264          ait < Seg2PbCopy()->Atoms().end();
00265          ++ait) {
00266 
00267         if (!(*ait)->HasQMPart()) {
00268             continue;
00269         }
00270 
00271         vec     pos = (*ait)->getQMPos();
00272         string  name = (*ait)->getElement();
00273 
00274         fprintf(out, "%2s %4.7f %4.7f %4.7f \n",
00275                         name.c_str(),
00276                         pos.getX()*10,
00277                         pos.getY()*10,
00278                         pos.getZ()*10);
00279     }
00280 }
